There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around November 6th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 3:35 i went to pick up my daughter at chisolm trail intermediate school. I also picked up my son and his friend from Fossil hill middle school. As we were going to drop off my son' friend roman velasquez on appleyard street my daughter notice that the sun appeared to be very bright with unidentified spots around it. We also noticed odd rays. My daughter quickly ran into the house to grab the camera to take pictures of what we witnessed. We couldnt believe what we were seeing at the time. We had no idea what it could have been but we had never seen anything like it. We walked back into the house to review some of the pictures, we decided we wanted to take more pictures of the object but as we went back outside the object had dissapeared.
Summary: UFO IN SKY AROUND 3:45. SKY APPEARED TO BE VERY BRIGHT.
